thread.title: ClickSoftware reports 1Q loss Singapore
thread.title_full: ClickSoftware reports 1Q loss - Yahoo Singapore Finance

author: Business Insider
title: ClickSoftware reports 1Q loss Singapore
text:
PETACH TIKVA, Israel (AP) _ ClickSoftware Technologies Ltd. (CKSW) on Wednesday reported a loss of $4.7 million in its first quarter. 
The Petach Tikva, Israel-based company said it had a loss of 14 cents per share. Losses, adjusted for one-time gains and costs, were 11 cents per share. 
The maker of human resources cloud computing software posted revenue of $26.7 million in the period. 
ClickSoftware shares have climbed 74 percent since the beginning of the year. The stock has climbed 37 percent in the last 12 months.
